What are your favorite changes?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Town Hall (Polls): MR4 Polls: What are your favorite changes?
By Pattongeneral on Monday, September 1, 2003 - 12:34 pm:

What are your favorite changes that htye have made ot the monsters? Personally, I think that what they did to the Psirollers, Gitans, Jokers and Durahans.

By Endless Vision on Monday, September 1, 2003 - 04:45 pm:

I never really liked Gitans, Psirollers, Mogis, or Lesiones. But now I think they look great!

By Hengar Jell Master on Sunday, December 28, 2003 - 08:28 pm:

I liked the fact that you don't have to unlock manay
monsters. I just started and I'm already raising a dragon
unlike in MR3 when you had to wait till A class to get
pancho and S class for Durahan and dragon and had to
unlock jokler and Zan through stories.

By Pattongeneral on Sunday, December 28, 2003 - 09:45 pm:

Yes, it is good to have those unlocked, but I would have liked a few more that were locked, just for the sake of challenge.

By Magma_Bird on Monday, December 13, 2004 - 01:13 pm:

MR3 was fun, but too cartoonish... MR4 boosted their graphics to look more mature.

I never liked psirollers, mogis, lesiones... but i did come across a cool looking gitan that looked like a little demon (Gitan/Zan)

The sub breeds look better IMO, but there are less sub breeds.

By Nicole on Friday, June 17, 2005 - 10:18 am:

I adore what they've done to the Lesiones - I've always liked them, but now most of them are just so adorable! And there's even a few that look adorale AND like they could seriously kick some behind. The Tigers have even returned to the 'more-wolfish-less-cartoony' look they had in MR2.

And I must admit that, though I loved the cell-shading in MR3, the graphics in MR4 look flawless and less kiddy.

By Queeny on Friday, September 30, 2005 - 05:57 pm:

I also like how in MR4, ANY Cd is unlockable. It seems that the only monster that you can't unlock in the beginning of the game is mocchi.

By Beck on Sunday, October 2, 2005 - 01:48 pm:

The team attack in adventures is really cool and the weekend thing gives you more to do. It's also nice to be able unlock so many breeds in the beginning even though it makes the game a lot easier which is a negative in my book.

By VenomousX on Monday, October 3, 2005 - 08:25 am:

Yes I agree with Pattongeneral, having at least a few locked would have been nice, its fun having sometihng extra to work for :]

By Queeny on Tuesday, October 4, 2005 - 05:58 pm:

There's still one negative thing that they haven't changed. IT'S REALLY HARD TO GET TO LEVEL S! I HAVEN'T EVEN GOTTEN THERE YET! GRR!

By Apocalypse on Wednesday, October 19, 2005 - 01:34 pm:

The way Jokers are available at the start of the game. In Mr2 I still dont have them.

By Salokin on Thursday, August 9, 2007 - 12:38 pm:

I love the way they changed the Jells. In MR3 i thought they were the wierdest things in the world. Now the Jells and Jokers are soe of my favorite monsters.
